Screen Printing Frames — Made in Italy

Since 1984, ITS Europe has been manufacturing professional screen printing frames in aluminium, wood and steel, fully designed and produced in Italy with artisanal quality, advanced technology and continuous innovation.

Reliability, high precision and fast delivery make our frames the ideal choice for companies and print shops looking for top-quality Made in Italy screen printing solutions.

Discover the products Contact us

Aluminum

6060 T6 alloy, commercial or custom profiles. Resistant to atmospheric and chemical agents, with TIG welding and edge prepared for gluing.

Learn more

Wood

First-class fir wood, custom sections. Economical and ideal for object printing.

Learn more

Iron

Commercial or classic profiles, welded with automatic machines. Coated in epoxy-polyester paint, offering adaptability and excellent value for money.

Learn more
